problem_text_cn: 如图1,一名伐木工人锯一根圆木,如果用锯所在的平面截得的图形如图2所示,当原木半径OA=100mm,弦AB=160mm时,则圆木被锯部分的最大高度为()mm．
problem_text_en: As shown in figure 1, a lumberjack saws a log. If the figure cut by the plane where the saw is located is shown in figure 2, when the radius of the log OA = N_0 and chord AB = N_1, the maximum height of the sawn part of the log is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,过O点作OC⊥AB,垂足为C,延长OC交⊙O于D点,连接AO,∵OC⊥AB,∴AC=\frac{1}{2}AB=80,又∵AO=100,∴在Rt△AOC中,CO=√{AO^{2}-AC^{2}}=√{100^{2}-80^{2}}=60,∴CD=CO-OD=40mm,故选:B．
